overview: Web novelist Eames and retired adult actress Yoo-jeong are immersed in a sweet newlywed life. However, at the request of the director with whom he was working in the past, Yoo-jeong has to do that job again. Following his wife's affair, the sudden appearance of his mother-in-law, who knows only his wife, begins to slowly shake at the attractive gaze of his mother-in-law. They come every night and fill it up.
title: Mother-in-law's taste
